changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(45) NULL, firstname VARCHAR(45) NULL, lastname VARCHAR(45) NULL, password VARCHAR(100) NULL, age INT NULL, sex VARCHAR(1) NULL, interests VARCHAR(200) NULL, city VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id));

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE follow_map ( userId INT NOT NULL, friendId INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (userId, friendId), INDEX FK_follow_map_friendId_idx (friendId ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT FK_follow_map_userId FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT FK_follow_map_friendId FOREIGN KEY (friendId) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION);
